elements.name: question3
elements.title: What impact has digitalization had on professional writing?
elements.correctAnswer: Today, most employees write their own texts.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: In which language areas does the Swiss dialect differ from the standard language? Name three areas.
elements.correctAnswer: Vocabulary, sentence structure, tenses, cases, relative pronouns

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What is the technical term for the difference between spoken dialect and written High German?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What is the technical term for typical Swiss-German expressions such as "Töff" and "etwas antönen"?

elements.name: question6
elements.title: What are the three phases of writing a text?
elements.correctAnswer: Text preparation, text transcript, text control
